description:
The chief accountant of CGS. He is one of the few at CGS who has no prejudices against the boys.
2nd season:Previously a member of the private security company CGS, the predecessor to Tekkadan, he was retained by Tekkadan due to his expertise in accounting. He currently serving as treasurer of Tekkadan`s Martian headquarters.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Dexter Culastor
